tool_description: Accurate and Reliable Data for 170 World Currencies. Exchange rates are updated every hour.
name: Currency Converter Pro
title: Currency Converter Pro

api_list.name: Latest Rates
api_list.description: Real-time exchange rate data of 170 world currencies. Updated every 10min.

optional_parameters.name: currencies
optional_parameters.description:
You can pass individual currencies for faster response.
Example:

EUR,RSD,AUD,CAD

api_list.name: Currencies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-converter-pro1.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-converter-pro1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert Currency
api_list.description: Convert any amount from one currency to another.
